short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control of your most valuable asset, your attention!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control of your browsing experience with the Celebrity Blocker extension. This simple yet powerful tool allows you to curate a personalized online environment by blocking content related to a pre-defined list of celebrities. Whether you're avoiding spoilers, minimizing distractions, or simply curating your feed, Celebrity Blocker helps you focus on what matters most to you. Customize your list to keep unwanted celebrity news, videos, and social media posts out of sight on popular platforms like Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok. Install today and enjoy a cleaner, more relevant browsing experience tailored just for you!
